name: azbot-telegram
description: Alynx Zhou's zero-dependency Telegram Bot API implemention.

scripts.build:doc: jsdoc -c .jsdoc.json -R README.md && echo 'tgbot.alynx.one' > docs/CNAME && touch docs/.nojekyll && git add -A docs/ && git commit -m "Updated docs."

author: Alynx Zhou <alynx.zhou@gmail.com> (https://alynx.one/)
